      • insertPin

               throws InvalidInputException
        Parameters:
        pin - for the bank card
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - pin is null or the length of the pin differs from 4

      • getAmount

        public java.lang.Integer getAmount(java.lang.Integer amount)
                            throws InvalidInputException,
                                   AmountIsHigherThanTheLimitPerWithdrawalException,
                                   AtmIsOutOfMoneyException,
                                   NoCardException,
                                   InvalidPinException,
                                   LowOnFundsException
        Parameters:
        amount - not null
        Returns:
        the withdrawn amount
        Throws:
        InvalidInputException - amount is less than or equals zero
        AmountIsHigherThanTheLimitPerWithdrawalException - amount is higher than the the atm's limit of a single withdrowal
        AtmIsOutOfMoneyException - there is not enough money in the ATM
        NoCardException - there is no bank card in the ATM
        InvalidPinException - the pin does not match with the pin of the inserted card
        LowOnFundsException - amount on the card is less than the requested amount

      • removeCard

        public void removeCard()
        Removes both the card and the pin from the ATM
